properties.title: Pumptrack Reitplatz Winterthur
properties.abstract: The pumptrack on the "Reitplatz" in Winterthur ist one of first nationwide. It is beautifully located and appeals for day trips. Through its diversity it offers a demanding challenge for every biker, despite their riding skills. Furthermore, the balance bike-track for kids is one-of-a-kind.
properties.description:
Amidst the unique recreational area onshore the river "TÃ¶ss", approximately ten minutes away from downtown, the pumptrack is to be found directly next to the restaurant and sport centre "Reitplatz". Different fireplaces and swimming possibilities create the perfect environment to dwell on.

The track challenges and fosters your riding skills. 
On a length of 280 meters, the hills, depressions and curves demand everyone's skills. The track is available at anytime and even lit at nighttime. For the little ones among us, there's a balance bike-track, which is a lot of fun and helps children to improve their skills. 

Both tracks offer each individual, despite their age or skill-level, an unforgettable fun-day - from families to experts.
properties.name: Sportamt Winterthur
